channel.title: CVE Feed for quadlayers -- WordPress Mega Menu – QuadMenu
channel.description: The latest CVEs for quadlayers -- WordPress Mega Menu – QuadMenu

item.title: CVE-2021-4443|2024-10-16T06:43:23.798Z -- quadlayers -- wordpress%20mega%20menu%20%E2%80%93%20quadmenu
item.description: The WordPress Mega Menu plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Arbitrary File Creation in versions up to, and including, 2.0.6 via the compiler_save AJAX action. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to create arbitrary PHP files that can be used to execute malicious code.
